issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

getString and possibly other methods are returning the underlying Java object and not forcing it to the Javascript type. This causes problems with HTTPClient and possibly other APIs that are expecting objects of type string.

{html}
fields.summary: Android Properties api not typecasting to Javascript objects correctly

comments.body:
{html}

(from [7bd8674053ce599d9796bd8f5334dbda9ee74133]) [#153 state:resolved] forced Java objects to Javascript when returning from Properties API http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/7bd8674053ce5...

{html}
